The '''Evil Releasing Method''' is  a direct counterpart to the Evil Sealing Method. It is used to release technique-induced seals on a person rather than sealing it. Compared to the Evil Sealing Method, the Evil Releasing Method requires far less preparation. Sasuke Uchiha used this technique to revive [[Orochimaru]], mixing a piece of [[Kabuto Yakushi]]'s modified flesh to create a physical body for the consciousness of Orochimaru that was left in [[Anko Mitarashi]]'s [[Cursed Seal of Heaven]].
